resources.string: Welcome Friend! \n\n Get ready to embark on a thrilling journey filled with excitement, and suspense.

Aim Of The Game! 

 Within the game there will be a number that goes down after every turn. 

 However, for each round of players goes by, the drinking counter goes up! If you hit zero, you have to drink the amount on the counter.
Create Your Players! \n\n Now this is the fun part, you get to make your character! You can either take a photo of yourself, or if you\'re having a bad hair day, you can draw your character.
Choose your class! \n\n On top of creating your player, you can choose a class which grants you a perk in the game.
Choose A Starting Number! \n\n The aim of the game is not to get to 0. Tip ~ The lower the number, the faster the game, and most likely the less you drink!
Generate Button! \n\n Let me introduce you to the two main buttons. First, there\'s the \'Generate\' button, which will randomly choose a number between 0 and the one you\'ve selected.

Wildcard Button! \n\n This button throws tasks, quizzes, and challenges your way. Fail or skip them, and you\'ll have to take a drink. If you succeed, you can make someone else drink. Oh, and don\'t forget, your turn is skipped after using it.
The End! \n\n Once a player hits that dreaded zero, they\'re the loser and must face the consequence of drinking the amount on the counter!

Hurray! \n\n You\'ve completed a round of High To Low! If the thrill of the game hasn\'t quenched your thirst for excitement, why not play it again, and again, and again. Literally do whatever you want, you\'re a free person so live your gorgeous life.

Settings! \n\n Within the settings you will find options to make it one screen, or make it split screen. They both produce the same game, but split screen makes it easier if you are sitting across from someone.
Tips And Tricks! \n\n You can also change the wildcards and edit them/add more.
Thank you! \n\n I hope you enjoy our game!
